articles.author: Ayushi Agrawal
articles.title: Song Joong Ki and wife Katy Louise Saunders depart for Hungary for former’s My Name Is Loh Kiwan shoot - PINKVILLA
articles.description: The Hottest K-town Couple Has Left South Korea For Europe Along With Their Fluffy Mate Through The Incheon International Airport.
articles.content: On February 16, just a couple of weeks after becoming husband and wife, the two have decided to leave South Korea where the British beauty and her family are known to have been residing for some time… [+1244 chars]
